description: Kakeru`s classmate and friend. He was nick-named Gigolo by Kakeru but he was far from being a ladies` man. He is often forgotten by his friends due to his lack of Existence. He`s also got crush for Yurika Kochikaze but always ends up not being able to tell her or being ignored. But, he is a reliable person at times of need, always ready to help his friend.
name: Amaji Gorou
